circumstances: On approach to Béchar Airport by night, the crew failed to realize his altitude was too low when the airplane struck the ground and crashed in a desert area located about 15 km from the runway threshold. 14 passengers were killed while nine other occupants, among them all three crew members, were injured.
probable_cause:
The accident was the consequence of the combination of the following factors:
- Poor approach planning, 
- The crew failed to comply with published procedures, 
- Lack of crew coordination, 
- Crew fatigue,
- A possible malfunction of the captain altimeter.
